item.title: Kite power system
item.description: Project Overview: Kite Power System for Wind Energy Harvesting Step 1. Understand the Objective The aim of the kite power system is to demonstrate a new technology for harvesting wind energy with a significantly lower material and environmental footprint and a higher capacity factor than conventional wind turbines. Step 2. Learn the Key Details This innovative approach, showcased in this video, explores using kites to harness wind energy more efficiently and sustainably.
